name: @pokus/restream-io
description: Well I am an OAuth2 application, that can play with restream.io Rest API (in the name of you)

scripts.clean: npm run clean-logs && rm -fr newman/ && mkdir -p newman/
scripts.test: echo "No test have been implemented yet" && exit 7
scripts.start: echo "No start has been implemented yet"  && exit 127
scripts.wlog: npm run clean-logs && npm run watch 2>&1 | tee -a ./pokus.watch.logs
scripts.watch: export DOCTOTHON_BASE_URL=${DOCTOTHON_BASE_URL:-'http://localhost:5000'}  && nodemon --trace-warnings -x "npm run build-css && npm run "
scripts.dev: npm run clean-logs && npm run watch 2>&1 | tee -a ./pokus.watch.logs
scripts.help: echo "set OS_DISTRIB to either 'macos' or 'linux'"  && exit 127
